about_the_game:
Secrets hidden in mushrooms

The goal of the game is to create various magical items, but before you can make them, you have to discover recipes for them. And you’ve guessed it, they’re hidden in mushrooms. Extract clues from fungi with laboratory equipment and magic, then combine the proper to solve the puzzle and discover the aforementioned recipes. There is no one clear path to your goal, so you have to get down to it and EXPERIMENT!

Have a green thumb for mushrooms

Before you begin your experiments in the lab, you will need to grow some fine fungi specimens. Awaken your inner gardener by planting and framing all kinds of mushrooms. Manage their soil, water supply and exposure to sun and watch them grow in real time. While you are waiting for your shrooms, you can feel free to redecorate your laboratory to make it cozy and unique.

Let the mycology and magic commence - WISHLIST NOW!

name: Shroom Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Shroom Keeper is a mushroom farming simulator and a puzzle game that encourages experimentation. So grab your flasks and gardening tools - there is science to conduct and magic to be made. Discover the might in the mycelium!
